item.title: Command Line Arguments in R
item.description: In this post, I explain how I sometimes conduct simulation studies on a compute cluster. In this example, I simulate a toy dataset, fit a linear mixed model, and collect the resulting regression coefficients. There are three main objectives which motivated this example: I want to run many replications for a given simulation scenario while leveraging the many CPUs available on a compute cluster I want to alter the simulation parameters with minimal effort I want to collect the results from each simulation scenario into a single data.
